data.title: International Education Day: Social and economic factors affecting the society
data.caption: January 24 is marked as the International Day of Education by the United Nations General Assembly to celebrate the role of education for bringing peace and development.

data.title: CBSE Class 12 History #CrashCourse: Bhakti movement's emergence and influence
data.caption: Here is how Bhakti movement led to changing the whole religious scenario in India. An important topic for the class 12 CBSE board aspirants.

data.caption: The trend of creating academies which began in 2018 will continue to grow in the years ahead because it allows companies to train a workforce that is employable by them.

data.title: New built environment sector will affect 44 million jobs in India
data.caption: According to a study, the Indian built environment sector will face acute shortage of (85 per cent) skilled manpower, across various professional categories that translate to 44 million jobs.

data.title: IGNOU Admissions 2019: Application begins for MA development studies programme

data.title: Indian Army Recruitment 2019: Engineering graduates can apply @ joinindianarmy.nic.in, check details here
data.caption: The Indian Army has released an official notification inviting all the engineering graduates and widows of Defence Personnel for grant of Short Service Commission (SSC) in Indian Army in all Arms/Services.

data.title: CISF Recruitment 2019: Hiring for 429 posts begins @ cisfrectt.in, check eligibility criteria, important dates here
data.caption: The Central Industrial Security Force (CISF) has started the online registration process for the post of Head Constable. All the candidates can apply for the CISF Recruitment 2019 in the prescribed format latest by February 20 on the website, cisfrectt.in

data.title: 207 engineering executive trainees to be hired for NTPC Recruitment 2019 through GATE 2019: Apply now @ ntpccareers.net
data.caption: The National Thermal Power Corporation Limited (NTPC) has invited candidates for 207 posts of Engineering Executive Trainees in the discipline of electrical, mechanical, electronics, instrumentation and mining. All the interested, eligible candidates are requested to apply through the prescribed format on or before January 31 on the official website, the link for which is ntpccareers.net
